practice_phrases: Telling the truth is stupid
说实话是愚蠢的
Telling the truth is stupid sometimes
说实话有时是愚蠢的
Let's agree telling the truth is stupid
我们同意说实话是愚蠢的
I'm afraid telling the truth is stupid
我担心说实话是愚蠢的
You'll forget telling the truth is stupid
你会忘记说实话是愚蠢的
Telling the truth is stupid when it hurts
当它伤害时说实话是愚蠢的
Let's agree that telling the truth is stupid sometimes
我们同意有时说实话是愚蠢的
I couldn't imagine telling the truth is stupid to everyone
我无法想象对每个人来说说实话是愚蠢的
I'm afraid you'll forget why telling the truth is stupid
我担心你会忘记为什么说实话是愚蠢的
Let's agree telling the truth is stupid when they both left together
我们同意当他们两个一起离开时说实话是愚蠢的

seed_context.known: Let's agree that it was stupid to tell the truth.
seed_context.target: 我们同意说实话是愚蠢的吧。
